oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Jude Foundation Benefit Game: Christian Brothers College vs. Loyola University, January 7, 1957
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Basketball; Programs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The program for the St. Jude Foundation Benefit Game between CBC and Loyola of New Orleans of January 7, 1957 provided information about the idea behind and the mission of the soon-to-be-built St. Jude Hospital for Underprivileged Children, later to be known as the St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. Information about the competing schools and their teams--lineups and rosters--were also included.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
